author: Special Correspondent
text:
Gandhiji Seva Sangam, in association with Peace Trust, organised an environment awareness camp, sponsored by the Union Ministry of Environment and Forests, at Veeraperumalpuram in Tirumangalam taluk recently. Experts spoke on the need to avoid use of chemical fertilizers and plastic items and to grow trees.

An awareness rally was flagged off by I. Maria Joseph. Vijayalakshmi, panchayat president, presided over the camp. Ilayaraja of Madurai Kamaraj University delivered a lecture on organic manure. K. Pichai welcomed the gathering and Subbulakshmi proposed a vote of thanks.
title: Environment awareness camp
